content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'stagedata_datalakeproyectomaestria_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [stagedata_datalakeproyectomaestria_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://stagedata@datalakeproyectomaestria.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stage.CuentaAhorros_Producto (
	[TipoProducto] nvarchar(4000),
	[NumeroProducto] nvarchar(4000),
	[Sucursal] nvarchar(4000),
	[File_name] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Cuenta Ahorros/Producto/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [stagedata_datalakeproyectomaestria_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO
